latex: For how many unordered sets $\{a,b,c,d\}$ of positive integers, none of which exceed $168$, do there exist integers $w,x,y,z$ such that $(-1)^wa+(-1)^xb+(-1)^yc+(-1)^zd=168$?  If your answer is $A$ and the correct answer is $C$, then your score on this problem will be $\left\lfloor25e^{-3\frac{|C-A|}C}\right\rfloor$.
